title: 1938 Országos Bajnokság I (men's water polo)
text:
1938 Országos Bajnokság I (men's water polo) was the 32nd water polo championship in Hungary. There were nine teams who played one round match for the title.


== Final list ==
* M: Matches W: Win D: Drawn L: Lost G+: Goals earned G-: Goals got P: Point


== 2. Class ==
1. NSC, 2. Szegedi VSE, 3. NTE, 4. Tatabányai SC.


== References ==
Gyarmati Dezső: Aranykor (Hérodotosz Könyvkiadó és Értékesítő Bt., Budapest, 2002.)
Magyar Sport Almanach 1937-1939
summary: 1938 Országos Bajnokság I (men's water polo) was the 32nd water polo championship in Hungary. There were nine teams who played one round match for the title.
